statements: SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT agent_id, response_time FROM performance_metrics WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT response_time, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM performance_metrics WHERE agent_id = 5;
SELECT agent_id, response_time, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM performance_metrics WHERE response_time < 0.5;
SELECT customer_satisfaction_rating, agent_id FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY agent_id ASC;
SELECT agent_id, response_time, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT customer_satisfaction_rating, agent_id, response_time FROM performance_metrics WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE response_time < 0.5 ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(response_time) AS avg_response_time, MAX(customer_satisfaction_rating) AS max_satisfaction FROM performance_metrics WHERE agent_id = 15;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY agent_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM agent_metrics;
SELECT agent_id, customer_satisfaction, response_time FROM agent_metrics;
SELECT * FROM performance_tracking WHERE response_time > 50;
SELECT tracking_id, response_time, agent_id FROM performance_tracking ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(response_time) AS average_response_time FROM performance_tracking GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT agent_id, response_time, customer_satisfaction FROM agent_metrics WHERE response_time > 100 ORDER BY customer_satisfaction DESC
SELECT tracking_id, response_time, customer_satisfaction FROM performance_tracking WHERE customer_satisfaction >= 4.5 ORDER BY response_time ASC
SELECT agent_id, customer_satisfaction FROM agent_metrics WHERE customer _satisfaction < 4.0
SELECT * FROM performance_tracking WHERE response_time BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND customer_satisfaction < 4.0 ORDER BY response_time DESC
SELECT agent_id, response_time FROM agent_metrics WHERE response_time < 50 ORDER BY agent_id ASC
SELECT agent_id, response_time, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM agent_performance_metrics ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT agent_id, total_ratings, average_rating FROM agent_ratings ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interactions_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING interactions_count > 5;
SELECT agent_id, response_time, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM agent_performance_metrics WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM agent_performance_metrics WHERE response_time < 10 ORDER BY customer_satisfaction_rating DESC
SELECT agent_id, response_time FROM agent_performance_metrics WHERE agent_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY agent_id ASC
SELECT agent_id, AVG(customer_satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM agent_performance_metrics GROUP BY agent_id HAVING avg_rating > 4
SELECT agent_id, total_ratings FROM agent_ratings WHERE total_ratings > 50 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, response_time FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, response_time FROM agents WHERE response_time > 5;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM agents WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT agent_name, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM agents WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM requests WHERE request_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY request_time DESC;
SELECT agent_name, request_type FROM agents JOIN requests ON agents.agent_id = requests.agent_id WHERE request_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT response_content FROM responses WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(response_content) > 100 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS average_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY agent_id HAVING AVG(satisfaction_rating) > 4.5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, response_time FROM agents ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, response_time FROM agents WHERE response_time BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, response_time FROM agents ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM agents INNER JOIN interactions ON agents.agent_id = interactions.agent_id;
SELECT agent_name, response_quality_rating, performance_metric FROM agents INNER JOIN reports ON agents.agent_id = reports.agent_id WHERE reports.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
